task.name: agent.behaviors.tasks.TransportACrowd
task.description: To transport a entire 'Crowd' toward a given destination. Depending on its crowd transport capacity, agent will make as many round trips as necessary between 'loadingPosition' and the 'targetDestination'. Because the agent can only transports crowds' concentrations, this mission needs a loading position to indicate which concentration to transport. Indeed, a crowd can be compouded with several separated concentrations. Only one concentration can be transported at a time. The agent will transport the nearest concentration from the "loadingPosition" parameter.

parameter.name: loadingPosition
parameter.description: The crowd's concentration position where to load the elements of the crowd.

parameter.name: targetDestination
parameter.description: The position where to transport the crowd.

stage.label: Crowd transport started
stage.description: To transport the given Crowd on the target destination.
